attributes.action: dedicate an army of flying dinosaurs to act as the UK's nuclear deterrent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An army of dinosaurs would roam the skies of Britain, these dinosaurs would eat any nuclear warheads coming toward britain, thus stopping the effects of America "accidently" throwing some at us.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
